entries.title: U.S. Places Top Chinese Memory Chip Maker on Export Blacklist
entries.description: The measure aimed at Yangtze Memory Technologies Co. comes as U.S.-China technology tensions are on the rise.

entries.title: Bill to Ban TikTok on Government Devices Faces Uncertain Future in House
entries.description: The proposed ban comes amid delays in U.S. negotiation to secure data gathered by the popular Chinese-owned video app.

entries.title: Sam Bankman-Fried's Arrest Offers Cold Comfort to FTX Customers
entries.description: Prosecutors and regulators alleged this week that the crypto exchange’s founder stole billions of dollars from customers.

entries.title: Elon Musk's Twitter Barbs Have New Magnitude
entries.description: The entrepreneur’s approach is getting new scrutiny now that he owns the social-media platform where he has been a super user for years.

entries.title: Elon Musk Sold More Than $3.5 Billion Worth of Tesla Shares
entries.description: The CEO’s sale of Tesla stock has weighed on the company’s share price, which is down more than 50% in 2022.
